scripts.build: npm run lint && node ./scripts/build.js && npm run build:rollup && tsc --build
scripts.publish:next: npm run build && npm publish --access public --tag=next --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.publish:dev: npm run build && npm publish --access public --tag=dev --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.publish:alpha: npm run build && npm publish --access public --tag=alpha --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.publish:beta: npm run build && npm publish --access public --tag=beta --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.publish:npm: npm run build && npm publish --access public --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.publish:local: npm run build && npm publish --access public --registry=http://172.16.240.221:8081/repository/local/
